page.title: 09Old People(day care)Wantage
page.content:
The Day Centre was opened in 1973.It is open from 9.30am until 4pm on five days week.It caters for about 200 people each week, usually 45 per day. There is an organiser and a relief organiser. They look after elderly people who are lonely or who cannot manage at home during the day.They make sure that everyone arrives and arrange transport,either cars or ambulances, for those who need it.
The old people like to talk,make new friends or read the paper. They can do handicrafts such as making toys, doll's clothes or baskets.They can play cards or bingo.They can have their lunch and have their hair done or have their feet seen to. We take harvest gifts to them in September.
